VersionHistory.name: SPARQLANSWER2NL
VersionHistory.Version: - initial - implement base application with docker and flask - add templates and static files
- implement stable connection to postgre server - display all queries on sample-query file
- add password file for connecting to postgre
- implement input query textarea and submit button
- add static class log manager for logging application in file - make sql manager a static class with static methods
- add version history xml file for tracking version and application changes - display latest version at footer of page

- implemet requests with ajax and flask without loading whole page - add query method that recieves POST requests from ajax - implemet SPARQLManager that sends queries to an endpoint and recieves json results - display query result on answer-query template
